sourcesContent:
import { Alert, Container } from "react-bootstrap"; import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import messageFile from "../MessageTrigger"; import hny2023 from "../files/hny2.jpg"; export default function Todos() { const [message, setMessage] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { fetch(messageFile) .then((content) => content.text()) .then((messageText) => { setMessage(messageText); }); }, []); return (
{/*} */} {message} Overview

The Falcon project is for maintaining the Pay and Allowances of the Officers of Indian Army.


{/* Progress
  • Database Design
  • Live hosting on WAN for quick feedback from PCDA(O)
 */} Updates
  • December Masters updated in Falcon.
  • FIFO Implemented in Bill Processing.
  • New Screen for prioritizing Bills for TSS and IDAS Officers.
  • Dak Type Change Available for TaskHolders in Bill Processing Screen.
  • Cdao No readOnly in Bill Processing Screen.
  • Screen to view consolidated PM month-wise for TSS.
  • Screen to view NSG, Assam Rifles, 652 Coy related Reports for Technical Section.
  • Rejection Count and Rejection Percentage now visible in Task-Wise DPR Screen
  • Handed-Over and Taken-Oven Remarks at the bottom of Dak TopList Pdf.
    • {/*
  • Live hosting on WAN for quick feedback from PCDA(O)
    • */}
Bugs
  • No known bugs
 Todos
  • Dynamic Menu and Layout
  • Search, Sort, Pagination
 Technology Stack
    This project is being developed on Spring Boot Java and React front-end.


    OS
    • Linux

    Front End
    • React
    • Bootstrap for UI
    • Tailwind CSS for styling
    • React-hook-form for forms
    • Yup for form validation
    • Axios HTTP Client for REST API
    • Apollo Client for GraphQL (Experimental)

    Back End
    • Spring Boot : Java
    • Uses REST API
    • GraphQL support
    • Database : PostgreSQL
    • Requires Java 11 or higher.

    Tools
    • IDE: Spring Tool Suite
    • Code Generation : JPA, Python
    • Firefox Browser
 The Team
  • Domain: PCDA(O), Pune
  • Development: ITSDC, Secunderabad{" "}
); }
